document.full_text: s-lcd, a flat screen joint venture between sony corp and samsung electronics, said it would reduce capital by $555 million, as sony struggles with perennial losses from its tv business and samsung seeks to shift to a new type of display.
document.title: samsung, sony jv to cut capital as sony struggles with tv loss
lines_and_colors: s-lcd, a flat screen joint venture between sony corp and samsung electronics, said it would reduce capital by $555 million, as sony struggles with perennial losses from its tv business and samsung seeks to shift to a new type of display.
